attributes.action: Make public sexual harassment a crime in the UK
attributes.additional_details: This is a scary statistic and there needs to be action, because if women aren't safe walking home, then where are we safe?
attributes.background:
I want the government to impose criminal punishments for anybody who publicly sexually harasses someone. 
In light of recent circumstances, women have not felt safe on the streets and it has been reported that 97% of young women in the UK have ben sexually harassed.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578940
